title: Start
body:
<<You>>  
<<emotion angry>> 
All I can remember after crap went down on the island was a falling branch and hurting my head.
Now, i'm on the verge of awakeing from a nap.
I'm weirdly warm, like something is blowing warm air at me.
<<UN>> 
Awaken, boy.
<<You>> 
Nuh uh 5 more minutes...
<<UN>>
HEY.
WAKE.
UP.
NOW!!!!!
[[Please don’t kill me.|1A]]
[[(Say nothing)|1B]]
[[This isn’t real! You are not real. This is just a hallucination.|1C]]

title: 1A
body:
<<emotion happy>>
Calm down, I’m not gonna kill you. I just want you to open all the gates so I can see my daughter.
<<addmeter 10>> 
[[2nd]]

title: 1B
body:
Hello??  Can’t you speak the words that are coming out of my mouth boy?
<<lessmeter 10>>
[[2nd]]

title: 1C
body:
<<emotion happy>>
I’m real alright and you will help me get out.
[[2nd]]

title: 2nd
body:
<<emotion normal>>
Okay, let me try this again.
<<sasha>>
Hi, I am Sasha.
And you will help me and my daughter.
Or you shall be stomped.
[[Only if you can get me out of here alive successfully|2A]]
[[“Stomp on me?” I’m an ant compared to you.|2B]]
[[I don’t know you or what you even are!!!|2C]]

title: 2A
body:
<<emotion angry>>
You don’t trust me, boy!!!
[[I… just want to go home|A1]]
[[We both get what we want and the name is “Robert”|A2]]
[[You and your child can’t get out without me.|A3]]

title: A1
body:
<<emotion normal>>
<<addmeter 5>>
Hmm… okay, but be warn do not get in my way again or your never getting home
[[3rd]]

title: A2
body: Smart one. I don’t like that in my preys, but I allow this once Robert.
